title: In Game Freezing.
body:
This started happening two patches ago then stopped in the last one. The newest patch where senna was released it started to happen again. I will be in my match and randomly during the game between 2-20 min the game will completely freeze including my PC (every single match). No alt-tab alt+f4 nothing.  I have tried hextech repair tool, in-game repair, reinstalling, changing which disk drive it is installed on, and updating and unupdating drivers for gpu. I have a.
GPU: 1660ti
CPU: AMD 3600
This does not seem to happen when i am play practice tool, but all other game modes with pvp will freeze including TFT.
would like to know any solutions to this asap before the ranked season is over. :)

replies.body: If your entire computer is freezing, that is a hardware or driver flaw, not anything to do with the game. The game may trigger it, but it cant fix it.
Any ideas for what I should try? other games such as siege and modern warfare run fine.

Identifying those sort of issues tends to be very difficult unless you have some tech background.

Whocrashed may turn something up, if you dont know how to analyze logs yourself: https://www.resplendence.com/whocrashed

However, it does not sound like the sort of error that gives windows a chance to produce a crash dump. Could be memory, but i am betting GPU driver..
